description:
A compulsive gambler, a proficient poker player, and excels at cheating. His Stand is Osiris, which transforms the soul of D`Arby`s defeated opponent into a poker chip, and gives D`Arby himself an almost superhuman sense of touch.
He plays Jotaro in a Poker game after beating Polnareff and Joseph. Jotaro bluffs him into a nervous breakdown, causing him to forfeit the game in the process.
name: Daniel J. D`Arby
